attributes.action: Ensure fairness. Why enforce a smoking ban when Brussels Euro Offices have an exemption!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new smoking ban comes into effect in the UK shortly.
Yet again, there is one rule for us "common people" and a seperate rule for our "elected".
Brussels Euro Offices have created themselves an "opt out" as they cannot police their own offices.
If you do not think this is fair (smoker or not), please sign this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
